website_summaries.verdict: These are some of the most highly rated keto snacks in terms of taste.
pros: With 9g of protein and only 4g of net carbs
These nutty bars come in chocolate or vanilla, and are delicious and filling
Handmade in Texas, and contain no soy, gluten, whey, or GMOs
cons: No returns, and they use erythritol, a sugar substitute which some people would rather avoid

website_summaries.verdict: A great keto bar option that is also gluten, soy, and whey-free and comes in a couple different flavors.
pros: Each bar contains 4 grams of net carbs and 9 grams of protein
Great taste with a good crunch and will keep you full for a long time
cons: The texture is a bit crumbly and these do contain sugar alcohol

customer_reviews.title: Best commercial keto bars out there!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are AMAZING. I've been keto for three years and do most of my cooking and baking at home and I am yet to find a snack/breakfast recipe that tastes as flavorful as the Stoka bars. Texture is great too, not crumbly yet they are crunchy. Good portion size, too. They are pricey, though, so a suggestion for the manufacturers: maybe offer a discount for bulk purchases, monthly subscription, or something along these lines to reward loyal customers who will keep coming back for more (i.e. me!).
customer_reviews.author: XX

customer_reviews.title: So good!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how delicious these are. They look like something you would hang on a bird feeder in the dead of winter, so it was a huge surprise when I first bit into one. They are SO good! Taste way better than any high-sugar, processed granola bar I’ve ever had. Crunchy, but not too hard, and a perfect balance of sweet and salty. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: These will blow you away!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible! I miss crunchy stuff on keto. One can only eat so many pork rinds or fried cheese chips. These bars are the best! They taste just like real granola bars and are filling. I broke up and almond vanilla one and poured on a bit of HWC, added a couple raspberries, and I had the perfect granola cereal. Seriously, where have these bars been all my life?! I also loved the packaging. The tissue paper inside with the little thank you card was just the sweetest touch. Thank you for making these incredible bars!
customer_reviews.author: John Kipling

customer_reviews.title: Ketolicious!  These are the Real Deal Ladies and Gentleman!
customer_reviews.text: Weighing in at a Svelte 4g Net Carbs..... Seriously 4 Net Carbs, 23g Fat and 9g Protein these are Keto-Perfect. For the Past 5-6 months me and my 3 kids have been cycling in and out of Keto... Its good stuff but finding Keto food thats ready made, healthy and tastes good has been a challenge. I am happy to let you all know that this Vanilla Almond Bar has passed the Nicky Test... Meaning she is so picky on flavor and taste that if its not delicious she will let us all know and she really really like this bar. Its a bit pricey so hopefully after a while the price will come down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Keto bar
customer_reviews.text: I can tend to throw myself off ketosis with some sweeteners. The day after eating the bar I tested myself and was still in ketosis. Considering the amount of sugar alcohols I was pleased (I know sugar alcohol does not count, but trust me, some people can be throw out of ketosis from them. I am one of those people). The above was the most important to me. Now on to the taste: Great taste. Texture is that of a granola bar. I are it while out with friends to hold me over until I got home and it worked perfectly. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for a busy RN
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING!! They taste just like a Nature Valley granola bar but with ingredients I can get behind. I’m an RN who spends most of her time on the road between patient houses, and these are PERFECT for throwing in my bag for a snack/meal between visits. I’ve been looking for something like this...I will definitely be reordering. Soon.
customer_reviews.author: Addie W

customer_reviews.title: New bars smaller and taste different!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the original 1.9 oz Stoka Vanilla Almond Bars....very disappointed with the new 1.8 oz Vanilla Almond Bar. The ingredients in the bar have changed (butter powder and psyllium husks have been deleted....inulin and sunflower lecithin have been added). It doesn't taste like the original and leaves a bittersweet aftertaste. Stoka had a good product....they should have left it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Dry Dustboards in Need of PB
customer_reviews.text: I am on Keto and have Diabetes. I got these because I am often on the run, and want to make sure that I have something that's in-diet to eat when I need something. These things, by themselves, have all the appeal of eating a particle board shelf. The only way they don't feel like you have made a total sacrifice is to spread some nut butter or cream cheese on them. Then, they are half-decent. I am not going to reorder, though. I am committing to making my own Keto snacks and just bought some more Glad food containers.
customer_reviews.author: David Kiley

customer_reviews.title: New recipe sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with these bars. I tried the older version they had and I can't believe they would even tough that recipe. It was seriously the best bar on the market but now these have different ingredients and have a powder taste as soon as you bite in. It also tastes like they added way more erythritol to these. It's very distasteful. Please bring back the old recipe. These will sadly end up expiring at the back on my pantry :(
customer_reviews.author: Keirys Peña

customer_reviews.title: These contain milk products
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as Paleo so I assumed they did not contain any milk or dairy by products. Every Paleo guideline I've followed prohibits milk which I am highly sensitive to so I can't eat them. Amazon shows this as a non returnable item. I have contacted Stokabar to see if they will take them back. If not, I am stuck with very expensive bars I can't eat. Beware if you are sensitive to dairy this is not the bar for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DeToy

customer_reviews.title: These are now just another mediocre Keto Bar.
customer_reviews.text: Stoka changed the formula and now these bars suck. What was great about them before was that they were crunchy and they had the texture of a granola bar. Unheard of in a Keto Bar! Then y’all complained that they were too hard. And now these are just like all the other terrible Keto Bars out there - crumbly, chalky, with an awful mouthfeel. Y’all ruined a good thing. I won’t be ordering these again. UNLESS, Stoka decides to go back to their original formula.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: New version/texture, beware
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I’ve ordered these several times before, loved the hard dense crunch and being able to enjoy it for 15-20 mins. This new version seems like it’s just compacted powder, tastes very similar, but no longer the great crunch you have to work at to enjoy, gone in a couple minutes. Will not be buying any more of this new version. This new version should have been a second alternative produce line for those that don’t like the hardness of the original, not a total replacement. Bring back “Stoka Classic”!
customer_reviews.author: Russell A. Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: New Recipe = Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The old bars were much better! Crisiper, Crunchier. These are like eating a spoonful of cocoa powder with bits of nuts mixed into it. So disappointing, bring back the old formula!
customer_reviews.author: Sleeper_M3

customer_reviews.title: WHY Change a great thing!
customer_reviews.text: It was so hard to find a CRUNCHY keto bar like a Nature Valley granola bar. Stoka had it and then they took it away! Now you're in the same category fighting it out with everyone else on a kind of chalky/somewhat flavorful keto snack. Bring back the old recipe!!! This will be the last order I place otherwise...
customer_reviews.author: Tripp Costas

customer_reviews.title: Ruined
customer_reviews.text: These bars are the perfect example of "If it ain't broke don't fix it". They used to be great -- satisfying crunch, no artificial aftertaste -- reminiscent of a Nature Valley bar. I recently bought a pack and immediately spit out the bite of the first bar I opened. YUCK. I contacted Stoka to let them know I received a bad batch, and they informed me that they had reformulated their bars and, in turn, made them inedible. The texture is gross...like an expired/stale Larabar? There is a horrible, bitter aftertaste. I was a loyal customer but I will never buy these again. Based on many other reviews I am not alone in missing the original formula. Hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: GGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Where's the crunch???
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same bars that I tried. They use to be so yummy and crunchy. I don't care for the new texture.
customer_reviews.author: Kristel

customer_reviews.title: The original formula was much better.
customer_reviews.text: We loved the original product and had purchased them many times. We do not care for the texture or taste of the new formula. The sweetness is overpowering and leaves an aftertaste. We will not be reordering. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: pungomom

customer_reviews.title: Changed bar
customer_reviews.text: Why did they change! Smaller and not as crunchy. I buy these for the crunch not anymore. Why mess with something good
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lifestyle in between meal snacks
customer_reviews.text: Yummo flavors... the variety pack keeps me "entertained"... the PBJ starts out as peanut butter but the jelly finishes off the experience... the sea salt caramel is a great balance of flavors...vanilla almond is my "comfort food" flavor....the peanut chocolate chip is my very special treat one!! ... the texture is somewhere between chewy and granola ... melts in your mouth ... not what i expected but was pleasantly surprised... could definitely see me crumbling these up and putting on op of greek yogurt ... ... #80PoundsDown
customer_reviews.author: buckeye mama cat

customer_reviews.title: Dry.
customer_reviews.text: These bars tastes terrible. Very dry. Also, the package arrived missing 2 bars. So weird. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Eldada

customer_reviews.title: Updated bars are smaller and not good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the old crunchy version of these bars. The most recent shipment I received is completely different in flavor, texture and size even. It would’ve been nice to get a heads up about this changed before ordering again because they can’t be returned and I just wasted my money on smaller and different bars than I thought I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Volks

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, but spiked my blood sugar
customer_reviews.text: Pros: These treats tasted delicious- sweet, nutty and crunchy, with a nice granola bar texture. Each bar is a decent size compared with other low-carb snacks. Satisfying as a meal replacement when short on time. Sweet enough for an after dinner ‘dessert’ (1/2 bar is plenty!). Cons: While the taste wasn’t overly sweet, I felt a surge of blood sugar immediately. Surprising, because these are ‘Keto friendly’. Tested my blood glucose several times and it spiked by 20-30 points each time. Not everyone reacts the same to sugar substitutes, so maybe these are good for some people - but I won’t be buying again, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vaz

customer_reviews.title: YES, Place The Order! You'll Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! The first bite was a bit dry so I thought they'd missed the mark on the recipe. By the second bite, the flavor kicked in and I was ready to order more. This is a perfect addition to our Keto snack rotation. After being Keto over a year now, we were excited to see something new to try that is in fact, Keto (meaning the ingredients are legit). Plus, I love the fact that I'm supporting a new, smaller business. Stoka for the win!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Third time wasn’t a charm.
customer_reviews.text: I’d bought these bars twice before, they were like granola bars. The texture of the product with my most recent order has changed and I won’t order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The original formula was way better
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these in the past and loved them. They used to be a great substitute for crunchy granola, like the Nature Valley bars, which is something I really missed since cutting carbs. Sometime recently the formula has changed and they are not good anymore... too soft, crumbly, sickeningly sweet with a really bitter aftertaste. Why, Stoka?? You should have left the original product alone!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Very expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the variety of Vanilla Almond and Coco Almond. Both have the same great texture and crunch and are very flavorful. I broke them up and ate them in 4oz Coconut/Almond Milk and added a small amount of berries. Blew my mind how good it tasted. Unfortunately my first order will also be the last. While they are very, very, good, they are not affordable for me to continue eating. If money was no issue, I'd order these by the truck load. One star knocked off for price.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these! I like the cocoa flavor one best
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I like the cocoa flavor one best, already ordered another box! Great texture and crunch. Handy to have in your car or purse for a fast snack.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: New formula is yuck
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bars, but my love has turned to yuck with this new formula. They are mushy, smaller, break apart, and the taste is too sweet. Completely different bar! If it’s not broken, why fix it?? I just cancelled my subscribe n save order.
customer_reviews.author: JenT

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best option
customer_reviews.text: Stoka Bars are simply the best option for a healthy snack bar. This is the only snack bar that doesn't make me feel bad after eating. Everything else I've tried makes me feel heavy or like I basically just ate a candy bar and said it was "protein" so it was good for me. Don't lie to yourself. Just eat a Stoka bar. Tastes great and is a health snack that isn't covered in chocolate pretending to get you swoll. My wife does Keto and loves Stoka Bars. My Aunt is Gluten intolerant and she loves them. I like food and love Stoka Bars.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Joseph Design

customer_reviews.title: Keto brought me here
customer_reviews.text: Normally I would have looked at the price tag on these bars and said “no way”, but on the first day I started keto I ordered these because the reviews were so fantastic. I’ve already tried one (obvious from my picture) and these bars are delightful. They are extremely crunchy (I ate mine over the kitchen sink), but the flavor is delicious. It is very filling. Even when I’m easing off of keto in a few months and adding carbs back in, I can still imagine buying these once or twice a month because I am working on making healthier choices. The nutrition on these is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Le

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: These bars they changed the size, packaging and they changed the ingredients. They're nasty and disgusting nothing like how they tasted back when they first came out awful never will buy again
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: New formula disappoints
customer_reviews.text: The old crunchy version was fantastic, my favorite keto bar. I just tried the new version and was really disappointed. They taste terrible and are crumbly, The dang bars are much better if you like this texture. Now i have to look for something else that has a granola like crunch.
customer_reviews.author: John Love

customer_reviews.title: YUM!!!
customer_reviews.text: YUM! Currently doing the keto diet and these are helping me get through it! Tastes like a crispy almond cookie. I have half of one every day with a cup of coffee. Have already reordered. I highly recommend if you're looking for a delicious low-carb snack.
customer_reviews.author: AMPshopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm Brand Loyal for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. I have bought these three times, and will buy again. The flavor is great, the product is perfect for my keto diet. They are priced fairly. And a real treat is how these bars come packaged: they are in a gift box, inside I unwrap the tissue, I read the enclosed card and believe I am worth this special touch. Smart marketing, excellent product, good service. Stoca bars are definitely five stars. I'm now brand loyal.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Danielson

customer_reviews.title: This Is Hard To Beat
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, you're looking for a low carb, high fat, relatively high protein, limited calorie bar. Also, if you're like me, you aren't expecting too much in the way of flavor and enjoyment. Well, you will be pleasantly surprised. This bar fits everything you are looking for and it also tastes great. I ordered the mixed box of vanilla and coco, and I just reordered full boxes of both. These are a complete, hands down winner.
customer_reviews.author: Rossputin

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with new texture or flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these before, many of them, they were like my favorite keto granola bar with clean ingredients. This last order the texture has changed, changed the entire consistency of the bar as well as the flavor. I won't be purchasing again unless they magically decide to go back to their original formula. Not worth the price anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Goulart

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Can do more with the flavor but not horrible. I was thinking it was going to be more crunchy but its actually not crunchy like a granola bar..more like, you can just taste that there are almonds in it. Its soft when I bite into it and a bit gritty as I chew it. I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for a low carb/ keto lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I have been keto for 2+ years and JUST discovered these. Love them! It’s hard to find “sweet” foods that don’t mess with your stomach or cause blood sugar spikes (which increases carb cravings). These taste great and are fantastic for a busy lifestyle. Highly recommended! They are a bit expensive, but I use these as a meal replacement (breakfast) most of the time. In comparison to purchasing a meal on the go, well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: New texture is awful!
customer_reviews.text: Hate the new texture! Where is the Krunch???? Why did you mess up a perfect bar! Sending back! The new recipe sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A crunchy bar that's not the same chalky chew
customer_reviews.text: The best way to describe this bar is a Nutty/Crunchy oatmeal bar. I tried both the vanilla and chocolate versions but didn't really think the chocolate was much different in flavor from vanilla. It's got a very slight sweetness with mostly a roasted almond taste. This is one of the first bars that I found myself liking that didn't have some form of hidden sugar and wasn't the typical chewy/chalky type protein bar. They are mild in flavor but they really satisfied my need for something a crunchy quick snack. Not sure why some people think it tastes like a partial board, I didn't find that the case at all.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Scinta Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Another keto bar that is like all the others
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on a whim as I wanted a keto bar that didn’t taste like cardboard and fit the size of the wrapper. Unfortunately, this one didn’t quite fit the bill. The taste is okay and it did not fit the wrapper. Why do manufacturers feel that they have to make a bigger wrapper to make the bar appear larger? Still tasted and looked like cardboard. The quest still continues for a keto bar that fullfills my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Missing

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these all the time until they changed them. I still like some of them but the PB&J and Cherry Almond were terrible. I spat them out in the trash. I might never order these again. Two out of 8 were worth eating but for the price i could practically have a chef come into my house, crush the almonds and make the bars right in front of me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Truitt

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These bars are so hard! I couldn’t even break them. I never had them before so I watched reviews on YouTube and see that they are crunchy but not break your teeth hard. I wouldn’t purchase again. The price is high to get bars I can’t even bite into or break.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to eat!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is very good, but texture and density of bars are not good. Very gritty texture. And bars are very hard and dense. Difficult to take a bite with your teeth. I feel like I could break a tooth! When I do break off a piece of the bar, crumbs fall all over my lap and make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These SoKa bars are amazing. Seriously yummy, it's hard to believe they are only 4g net carbs. No 'you should be ashamed of yourself' ingredients to be found. Nothing that will spike your blood sugar, even stealthily (I'm looking at you Maltitol). Crunchy, nutty, yumminess. I'll be ordering them again...can we get these listed on Subscribe and Save?
customer_reviews.author: Jamae

customer_reviews.title: Very Expensive For The Money:
customer_reviews.text: You only get 8 bars for $23.92. I noticed that the bars come in a box that once had 10 bars in them, and the manufacturer , reduced the amount to 8 bars. Companies do not want to increase their price so they reduce the amount. We will be moving on and finding another bar for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Buying again!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing on their own or broken up and used as a topping for low carb yogurt or ice cream. These are just the right amount of subtle sweet and big crunch. They have the texture of a Nature Valley granola bar, but more flavor. Use care when tossing them into a bag or purse. Tuck them into a side pocket, rather than leaving loose. They crumble easily, and if your not careful, you'll get a bag of granola pieces instead of a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy - Light Sweetness
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Stoka bars. They are pricey but great quality and keep me full. They are crunchy like a nature valley bar but not as sweet. They have a strong almond taste so make sure you love almonds if you buy these. I would purchase again, especially if the price decreases or there is a sale. I like supporting smaller keto/LCHF companies with my purchases who are doing things right and this is an example of that. I bought both flavors but loved the vanilla more. The crunch factor is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Good snacks for low carb lifestyles
customer_reviews.text: Really like these bars. But I do like the old formula a little better. I miss the crunchy ones. I know it’s just become the Stoka granola. Tasty Keto Snacks I keep in my desk at work or in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Tim from Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and crunch
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Im so happy I found a granola bar substitute. I have being doing a ketogenic diet for a month now and I've been missing the crunch. I bought the vanilla almond bar and cocoa almond combo pack. The vanilla almond are delicious and offer the perfect alternative for those watching their carbs but yet still yearn for a crunchy snack. I read many reviews on Amazon researching keto friendly bars and these were by far the least expensive and higher rated. I haven't tried the cocoa yet but I'll let you all know.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: very paletable and will not knock you out of ketosis
customer_reviews.text: Other than Bacon....one thing I miss on a keto diet is no "crunch". Crackers and other starch based products are off the ranch. These bars have a nice crunch and a good mouth feel and texture. I like to do about a 16 hour fast and break it at work about 10am with one of these bars and a La Croix flavored water. This keeps me going through my lunch workout and later afternoon meal. A bit pricey but a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet for my liking, but the crunch is spot on!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to have found these for my family as these bars are keto friendly. And I really wanted them to be great as the reviews are outstanding. My first impression is they look amazing and smell great. The ingredients are quality. The crunch is spot on and reminds me of nature valley bars. But the issue I have is that they’re too sweet for my liking. I use erythritol all of the time for baking and cooking so I’m familiar with it. If the company made these in a less sweeter version I’d definately continue to purchase them. Good luck to the company, I’m glad that I tried them, they’re just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer schroeder

customer_reviews.title: I miss the original texture and formula!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the entire product has changed... I really enjoyed the crunch of the original bars, there isn’t another bar on the market that has a “granola bar” crunch. I am so bummed because this was one of my favorite snacks. Now I have several bars left and I’m really not interested in eating them:(
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Subpar bar
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have mentioned, they do have a slight creamy texture to them, hard to explain since they are also very crunchy. Good portion size, definitely worked more as meal replacement paired with fruit or something green. A little too pricey for my liking and the flavors didn’t really blow me away. I’d probably not buy again since other low carb bars pack more flavor.
customer_reviews.author: AHays

customer_reviews.title: These are delicious
customer_reviews.text: So yes they are very hard, and difficult to eat as is, However, I like to crush them and make Keto yogurt parfaits with these. I also crush them and pour almond milk over them and eat it like cereal. They are a little pricy but I think it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: These are truly the BEST "diet/protein" bars on the market and BELIEVE ME...I've tried them ALL. The crunch is so satisfying and flavor is unbelievable. No bad after taste, disgusting breath or stomach issues. I am in SHOCK on how delicious these are. HAPPY HAPPY GIRL!!!!! Will for sure, keep these on hand all ALL TIMES!!!
customer_reviews.author: StacyFreddy

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for what you get. I would have liked to have the crunchy ness of a granola bar as someone referred them to be that way. So I’m a little disappointed. They are crumbly like Halva which is interesting. I would have liked the chocolate flavor to be a bit more pronounced but still good. Vanilla almond has kind of a strange flavor. I probably won’t buy them again. Now I wish I got the granola.
customer_reviews.author: S. LaRoc

customer_reviews.title: Really tasty
customer_reviews.text: I tried Stoka on a suggestion from someone who's also doing Keto. I'm always on the hunt for good quality great tasting bars I can add into my eating. These did not disappoint! They are delicious. The ones I purchase were the original formula which were very crunchy and I loved that (think natural valley granola for crunchiness),thought I have repurchased and they changed the crunch formula. They are not as crunchy as before but still very very delicious. They have great ingredients and good macros and they taste really really good. I would totally recommend if you are looking for a tasty keto bar.
customer_reviews.author: LiLVonKissez

customer_reviews.title: Product Wasn't Right
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased Stoka bars. They are uniform flat, hard, biscuit like bars. My last order was a fat, soft bar that tasted bad. I spit it out and was afraid to eat it.. Unfortunately I didn't realize it until a couple of months after purchasing. I contacted the Seller because something was seriously wrong with it and even if I can't return, they should know.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Low Carb
customer_reviews.text: These Stoka Bars are a great low-carb option if you miss granola. It has a satisfying crunch, and is a really good size. The chocolate one in particular is really good. The vanilla almond could use a slight improvement. I put this on top of low sugar yogurt with strawberries, cottage cheese, low-carb hot cereal, and it really goes well with those things.
customer_reviews.author: Fionna Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting !
customer_reviews.text: Although these are expensive, they are the best tasting bars on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write product reviews as often as I should, but I have to say that these are delicious! I am on a keto diet & finding something that tastes great, satisfies not only your hunger, but your sweet tooth & that can be thrown in your purse is hard to do. I really love them & will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dzwieleski

customer_reviews.title: How can this be keto? It’s so good!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious. There are a lot of keto snacks that don’t taste so great. I would eat these if I wasn’t on the keto diet. The vanilla is slightly sweet and doesn’t have that fake vanilla flavor. The chocolate one reminds me of Almond Roca. Pricey but soooo worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DHD

customer_reviews.title: Too crumbly and sweet
customer_reviews.text: This bar does provide energy, but it's way too sweet (should have less than half the stevia). It's also creates a mess because it's way too crumbly. Will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dick_Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Uneatible
customer_reviews.text: These were the worst snack bars I ever had. Taste like glued together sand. Took one bite and threw the whole box out since they do not take returns of give refunds. Try anything else.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: LUV!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! I have purchased many, many Keto-friendly bars, and these are by far the best. I pray they are never discontinued - I crave one every day! Please try them. Both flavors are wonderful, so I would suggest the box that contains both!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Less product weight than the original rollout same price same calories??
customer_reviews.text: Shame on Stoka bars your product has shrunk in half but you still charge the same price? What's even more strange half the amount of product but still same amount of calories??
customer_reviews.author: Joachim w patz

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE!!!!! They’re delicious!!??
customer_reviews.text: Ok, these are NOT inexpensive, but they are high quality. I usually choose chocolate over vanilla, but I’d have to say, the vanilla is my favorite. I was expecting cardboard with a dash of nut flavor.... But, SURPRISE- they’re delicious!!!! Very filling- I usually save half for later. I bet these would be great added to fruit or Greek yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: These taste weird. Not good. I don't reccomend. I gave them away. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Fareeda

customer_reviews.title: Missing Nature Valley?
customer_reviews.text: These bars are the closest thing I've come to a great protein bar. I'm not a fan of Quest Bars, they make me think I'm eating a giant tootsie roll. If you're a Nature Valley Bar lover, you'll love these bars. Vanilla Almond is my fav.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stevia looses the value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a low glycemic bar and ordered this product according to the great review. But I couldn't finish second Vanilla bar and first Coco Bar. I wish I can return the rest of bars. It is the taste of Stevia. If you know what I am talking about, you will not like them. But if you don't mind Stevia, you will enjoy the value of the product. I think Stevia is the only the problem and otherwise this is a good product. I wish the company will make new good product which not contains Stevia. I would love to know if they made it.
customer_reviews.author: YY

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: These Stoka bars are amazing. They are like granola bar but they are low carb. Great for us watching our carbs and sugar intake. The Stoka bars make a wonderful snack or a sweet treat. These are great to have on hand when you are running around and just need a little something till your next meal. Wonderful product. Thank you Stoka!
customer_reviews.author: dynomite

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Keto Bars
customer_reviews.text: Do you miss granola while eating Keto? Well get these.... These StokaBars are super crunchy and delicious.. I have bought both flavors and love them both.. I will keep these in my snack drawer.. So Good! ♥
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Great for cycling as they can go in Jersey pocket. They are delicious with zero aftertaste. I bit pricey but worth it for me! My favorite cycling or hiking treat.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: These keto friendly bars are very filling!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try these bars for the sake of having a convenient meal replacement. They are delicious! I really like the vanilla bar with a cup of coffee. The price ends up being only $2.99 per bar, which is cheaper than most of the meal replacement bars out there. The Stoka bar fills me up for a long time and is great on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Deal

customer_reviews.title: This bar bar become my absolute favorite while on a low carb diet
customer_reviews.text: This bar bar become my absolute favorite while on a low carb diet. The ingredients are of great quality and the taste is spot on. The crunch is satisfying, as is my belly after eating it. I love both flavors, the difference is subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So sweet and crumbled
customer_reviews.text: After opening the box I found that most of the bars where crumbled. They also had a sweetness to them that I found to fast a feel artificial.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Secco

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: A little bit on the sweet side, but a nice snack when you want something crunchy and you're trying to stay low carb. They're very much like a crispy granola bar where the "granola" has been put through a coffee grinder before being pressed into a bar.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay but Not Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: These bars are nothing special. They are small with a net carb count of 4. I will probably carry around a bar or two for those days when I am unable to get stop for lunch or dinner. I tried the chocolate and the taste was bland.
customer_reviews.author: SavannahMom2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Missing Crunch on a KETO Diet
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely delicious! They are just perfect on a KETO diet, I like some crunch in the morning, this bar, with a cup of coffee and cream, make a perfect breakfast, they crunchy, nutty and sweet, for me, hits all the important senses. May be a Little pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Mogil

customer_reviews.title: These are delicious and help when I need something sweet and crunchy without the sugar and carbs
customer_reviews.text: i'm doing keto and needed something I could eat on the go and I really missed granola bars. These are delicious and help when I need something sweet and crunchy without the sugar and carbs. I am so happy I found these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again. Very good taste!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good, although I don’t like the stevia in it or something that taste “diet like” , I would have been happy with honey. I will buy again for sure. The other review mentioned perfume smell and it’s the wrapping paper they put inside the box. My bar did not have the taste of it, so that’s all good.
customer_reviews.author: Therearemiracles

customer_reviews.title: Most delicious Keto bar I have ever tasted!  So satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I try all kinds of bars because I am FT working mom always on the go. I have been trying intermittent fasting to feel less of the sugar/insulin roller coaster and I look forward to having this bar every day. I wish I could buy even more with a discount like Subscribe and Save. My favorite flavor is Vanilla Almond.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F

customer_reviews.title: Yum Keto Bars
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my Stoka Bars and tore into it due to all of the reviews! Simply delicious! Perfect amount of crunch and sweetness. Wierdly enough it almost melts in your mouth too! Try them if you are keto or low carbing! You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lisha Vecchiarelli

customer_reviews.title: pricey but delicious
customer_reviews.text: All of the positive reviews are spot on. These are so good. Like granola bars but healthier. But the minuses for me are that they are only 9 G protein and they are small bars. Will probably buy again though, they taste that good.
customer_reviews.author: jhk

customer_reviews.title: Solid keto snack
customer_reviews.text: Decent macros with these bars: 23g fat, 4g net carbs, and 9g protein. More importantly I think is that they taste good. The vanilla in the vanilla almond bar is not too overpowering. I think the erythritol gives it just enough sweet to it. The coco almond bar tastes equally good. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: So much crunch ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Both flavors are fantastic. They are very crunchy. If you live the keto life, buy them now and thank me later. This is the stuff crunchy dreams are made of!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Yes I have crunch back in my life!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good!!! Omg!!! Absolutely ZERO aftertaste!!! Superb crunchy texture! I love that these are not sickening sweet like a lot of other low carb bars. I am so glad I trusted the other reviews here and got these. These will absolutely be a staple in my house. A perfect on the go snack. These will 100% cure your sweet tooth, which I am finding barely exists since I started doing Keto. I am so happy I found these. Planning on crushing one up and having some Keto cereal! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Ruckus

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy, not soft but taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these bars. Especially the chocolate. It is like eating a crunchy nut-filled brownie. The vanilla is good too but the chocolate is my favorite. I have one with my coffee every morning as my breakfast. But be prepared- they are not soft but very crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: These bars are so yummy and satisfying. I loved stoka bars when they were harder also. These new bars are formulated to be much softer but the taste is over-the-top delicious and satisfying. I would buy more often if they weren’t so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Stone

customer_reviews.title: OMG THANK YOU
customer_reviews.text: I am not compelled to write reviews but this is different! These are my favorite low carb bars ever! They taste better than regular granola bars! The quality of Ingredients is there! I was not paid or compensated for this review and I am reordering now so I dont run out of these!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Koch

customer_reviews.title: Yummo!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you eat low carb/Keto and miss granola type of bars, these are for you!!! Crunchy and satisfying. The bars are a good size and both flavors are so tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at how AWESOMSE these taste!
customer_reviews.text: I got these since I've been been searching for low-carb snacks that actually taste decent. I was very pleasantly surprised when i bit into it because I was expecting a mushy texture with funny after-taste, but it was actually very crunchy, delicious and filling. It was a nice treat and definitely satisfied the craving for a tasty snack. I definitely recommend to try these, considering the average price for these types of products I think they are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Janet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bars!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are simply amazing!! They appear to be dry at first glance but that is very deceiving. They are perfectly crunchy and the texture reminds me of biting into a almond roca. The taste is outstanding! You cant go wrong with either flavor, my wife and I love them both. The only draw back is the price, at 24.00 for eight bars it can add up quick. They really are outstanding thou, for a low carb bar. Order some and enjoy...
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are THE BEST vegan bars I've ever had! Love that they are crumbly and don't taste like a protein bar. They taste like more of a candy bar! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YEEESS BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These are AMAZING. They are crunchy and sweet and melt in your mouth...🤤 I have been looking for a keto bar for so long, apparently I’m picky haha, I’ve tried sooo many to no avail. BUT THESE BARS. Mmmmmmmmmm. So far I’ve only had the vanilla ones, but I will update after I try the chocolate. They remind of nature valley bars but way better. 😁
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best when it comes to keto bars
customer_reviews.text: I’m super picky when it comes to buying keto products, and Stoka is my number 1 recommendation when someone asks what I think they should try. These bars are the definition of tasty. High fat, low carbs, clean ingredients, and they are spot on with flavor and very filling. My favorite is the coco almond bar but both flavors are delicious. If you haven’t tried these yet you are missing out and haven’t lived life!!!! Definitely satisfies that crunch I miss from “granola” since doing keto. Amazing company as well, super friendly and inspiring! I’ll always support this company.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: thanks stoka
customer_reviews.text: YIPPIE Stoka!!! You make me happy on my keto diet, they remind me of the natures valley granola, not the sweetness but the crunch factor, these are so good thanks stoka
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Super tasty, but ultra pricey
customer_reviews.text: These definitely deserve 5 Starrs because they are absolutely delicious. However, they are super expensive compared with similar products. They are basically just pressed nuts combined with protein powder. That said, its still an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: 6 minute abs

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try these because of the negative reviews but I’m glad I got them anyway! They taste amazing! They are a bit pricey but I bought them for a upcoming trip where I will need a quick meal or snack on the go. I’m in love so far.
customer_reviews.author: edelury

product_meta.title: Stoka Bars| 4-Flavor Variety Pack | All Natural Energy Bar | High Protein | Low Carb | Keto and Vegan Friendly | Assorted Flavors| 8 Count
feature_bullets: Stoka Keto Energy Bar Variety Pack – Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Non GMO, Vegan, All Natural – Low Carb, High Protein – (2) Peanut Chocolate Chip, (2) Vanilla Almond, (2) Sea Salt Caramel, (2) Birthday Cake
GRAB AND GO – These nutrition bars beat powders and advanced dieting methods with nutritious, flavor rich bars that are easy to enjoy and make it even easier to stay healthy.
LOW NET CARBS – Nutrition never tasted so good! Chow down on this ketogenic Stoka variety pack, with bars that only have 3-4 net carbs and a whopping 8-9 grams of protein.
NATURAL INGREDIENTS – Make a fast meal out of fresh bars that taste delicious with low sugar and zero dairy. These pure ingredients are also paleo, keto, and vegan friendly.
THE STOKA ADVANTAGE – Turn to the best option for healthy living by starting with Stoka and enjoying where you end up.
